statements: DELETE FROM CourseMaterials WHERE lecture_notes IS NULL AND slides IS NOT NULL;
DELETE FROM LectureNotes WHERE author = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM LectureNotes WHERE author = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM lecture_notes WHERE course_id = 1 AND created_at < NOW() - INTERVAL '2 weeks';
DELETE FROM slides WHERE course_id = (SELECT id FROM courses WHERE name = 'Mathematics') AND slide_number > 10;
DELETE FROM quizzes WHERE course_id = (SELECT id FROM courses WHERE name = 'Physics') AND correct_answer = 0;
DELETE FROM slides WHERE course_id = (SELECT course_id FROM courses WHERE course_name = 'Mathematics');
DELETE FROM quizzes WHERE course_id = (SELECT course_id FROM courses WHERE course_name = 'Science');
